## SavedObjectsRepositoryFactory.createScopedRepository property

Creates a [Saved Objects repository](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.isavedobjectsrepository.md) that uses the credentials from the passed in request to authenticate with OpenSearch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createScopedRepository: (req: OpenSearchDashboardsRequest, includedHiddenTypes?: string[]) => ISavedObjectsRepository;
```
